categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Avorr was a male Sith Pureblood who was a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, where he could be found on Vaiken Spacedock.

Lord Avorr appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011. He is involved in the Sith Warrior class missions "A Sith Lord's Rise" and "Fanning the Flames," which are the ending missions for Chapters 1 and 2 of the class storyline respectively and see players visit Avorr—who does not speak—to receive a small reward.
